com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.subordinate

Class SubordinateControlHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.subordinate.SubordinateControlHelper

  • public final class SubordinateControlHelper
extends Object
    SubordinateControlHelper provides convenience methods to register Subordinate Controls for use with the SubordinateControlInterceptor.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Jonathan Austin

    • Method Summary

      Apply the registered Subordinate Controls.

      Clear all registered Subordinate Controls on the session.
      static Set<String> getRegisteredSubordinateControls() 
      static void registerSubordinateControl(String controlId)
      Register the Subordinate Control so that it can be applied by the SubordinateControlInterceptor.

    • Method Detail

      • registerSubordinateControl

        public static void registerSubordinateControl(String controlId)
        Register the Subordinate Control so that it can be applied by the SubordinateControlInterceptor.
        Parameters:
        controlId - the subordinate id

      • getRegisteredSubordinateControls

        public static Set<String> getRegisteredSubordinateControls()
        Returns:
        the registered subordinate controls or null

      • applyRegisteredControls

        public static void applyRegisteredControls(Request request,
                           boolean useRequestValues)
        Apply the registered Subordinate Controls.
        Parameters:
        request - the request being processed.
        useRequestValues - the flag to indicate the controls should use values from the request.

      • clearAllRegisteredControls

        public static void clearAllRegisteredControls()
        Clear all registered Subordinate Controls on the session.
